name: df-cpn
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(ccpn, cmpt(s0, cpw(cc), cmpt(s1, cn0, crab(s2, co(cc, cpm, cv(s0)), wcel(cfv(co(cv(s0), cdvn, cv(s2)), cv(s1)), co(cdm(cv(s2)), ccncf, cc))))))
comment: Define the set of ` n ` -times continuously differentiable functions. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 15-Nov-2014.)
